src:
Hasil Pertandingan Real Madrid vs Real Betis: 0-0
03 Nov 2019, 04:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid gagal memetik poin penuh di jornada ke 12 La Liga. Menjamu Real Betis di Santiago Bernabeu, Pasukan Los Blancos hanya mampu bermain imbang dengan skor 0-0.
Bermain di Bernabeu, Real Madrid langsung menggenjot serangan mereka. Mereka mencoba untuk menumbangkan tim tamu dengan gol cepat.
Baru enam menit laga berjalan, Karim Benzema sudah mengancam gawan Betis dengan tendangan kerasnya, namun ada Joel Robles yang sukses mematahkan tembakan tersebut.
Di menit kedelapan publik Bernabeu bersorak gembira. Eden Hazard berhasil menyarangkan bola ke gawang Betis setelah melakukan cutting inside dari sisi kiri lalu melepaskan tembakan mendatar yang gagal dihalau Robles.
Namun sorakan itu berubah menjadi sorakan kekecewaan setelah wasit tidak mengesahkan gol tersebut. Hazard berada dalam posisi offiside sebelum menerima bola sehingga gol itu dianulir.
Meski gol mereka dianulir, Real Madrid terus mencoba untuk mencetak gol. Real Betis bukannya tanpa perlawanan di laga ini, di mana pada menit ke 22 ia melepaskan tembakan melengkung namun bola masih melebar jauh dari gawang Courtois.
Jual beli serangan terus berlanjut hingga menjelang akhir babak pertama. Namun di masa tambahan waktu, Real Madrid nyaris membuka keunggulan. Melalui skema serangan balik, Karim Benzema memberikan umpan melalui dadanya ke Sergio Ramos, dan bola disambar sang bek namun tendangannya itu berhasil dipatahkan oleh Robles. Skor 0-0 bertahan hingga turun minum.

Baca Jalannya pertandingan di babak kedua di bawah ini.
text:
Real Madrid vs Real Betis results: 0-0
Nov 03 2019, 04:59 by Bola.net
Soccer - Real Madrid fail to get full points in the 12th season of La Liga. Entertaining Real Betis at the Santiago Bernabeu, Los Blancos were only able to draw with a score of 0-0.
Playing at the Bernabeu, Real Madrid immediately boosted their attacks. They try to subvert the visitors with a quick goal.
After only six minutes of the game running, Karim Benzema had threatened to fight Betis with his hard shot, but there was Joel Robles who successfully broke the shot.
In the eighth minute the Bernabeu public cheered happily. Eden Hazard managed to nettle the ball into the goal Betis after cutting inside from the left side then fired horizontally which failed to be driven by Robles.
But the cheers turned into cheers of disappointment after the referee did not validate the goal. Hazard was in the off position before receiving the ball so the goal was disallowed.
Although their goal was disallowed, Real Madrid continued to try to score. Real Betis was not without resistance in this fight, where in the 22nd minute he fired a curling shot but the ball was still wide away from the Courtois goal.
Buying and selling attacks continue until towards the end of the first half. But in the period of extra time, Real Madrid almost opened the scoring. Through a counter-attack scheme, Karim Benzema gave a pass through his chest to Sergio Ramos, and the ball was struck by the defender but his shot was broken by Robles. 0-0 score lasted until halftime.

Read the game in the second half below.
